name: Piyush Santwani
subtitle: Indie Hacker
about: I am a 28y old Indie developer and I make apps to bridge the accessibility gap between the Internet and the elderly 👵. I develop MVP in days, 🧙‍♀️ Magic with Javascript, 🤖 Automate the boring stuff, 👨‍💻 Hack third-party APIs, and I always find a solution to a programming problem. I am a Studio Ghibli fan and I play the guitar 🎸and sketch portraits for recreation.
thanksNote: Sending some ♥️ from INDIA. Thanks again for the coffee.
